Scene:
The Shido Temple
(Shidōji / 志渡寺)

Play: The Stone Monument of Glory (花上野誉碑)

Production: April 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))
